body_html:
@mrry thanks for the update.
I was using TF1.3. There's been a lot of changes to my graph since I found the problem. I am still using 1.3 but now each worker don't see other workers and only see the necessary PS. This reduces the connections a lot and I haven't seen any hanging problem.

body:
@mrry thanks for the update.
I was using TF1.3. There's been a lot of changes to my graph since I found the problem. I am still using 1.3 but now each worker don't see other workers and only see the necessary PS. This reduces the connections a lot and I haven't seen any hanging problem.
